holidays.title: International Day for Biological Diversity
holidays.description: Dedicated to making Earth a place where all creatures can not only survive, but also thrive.

holidays.title: National Maritime Day
holidays.description: National Maritime Day is a holiday that both honors and celebrates the Merchant Marine.

holidays.title: Bitcoin Pizza Day
holidays.description: How many Bitcoins would you pay for a pizza? Find out more about cryptocurrency right here!

holidays.title: Buy A Musical Instrument Day
holidays.description: This day is here to motivate you to create beautiful melodies with a brand new instrument.

holidays.title: Canadian Immigrants Day
holidays.description: Join us as we learn more and celebrate Canadian Immigrants Day this May.

holidays.title: Carb Day
holidays.description: This is the day for racing enthusiasts! It’s Carb Day and we are raring to go.

holidays.title: Declaration of the Bab
holidays.description: Learn about the Bahá’í Faith and the Promised One on this Declaration of the Bab day.

holidays.title: Don’t Fry Day
holidays.description: You wouldn’t let your child smoke, why let them fry? Don’t Fry Day is here!

holidays.title: International Coco Mom Day
holidays.description: International Coco Mom Day focuses on maternal health and raising children in a color-conscious world.

holidays.title: National Boss Babe Day
holidays.description: The sky's the limit for boss babes! Let’s celebrate all these amazing women today!

holidays.title: National Cooler Day
holidays.description: Grab your cooler filled with ice and drinks, and let’s head out this National Cooler Day.

holidays.title: National Craft Distillery Day
holidays.description: Relax and enjoy your favorite small-batch distilled spirit on National Craft Distillery Day. Cheers!

holidays.title: National Death Busters Day
holidays.description: Let’s remind ourselves and our loved ones to buckle up, be cautious, and drive safely.

holidays.title: National Road Trip Day
holidays.description: Think you know all about the ‘Great American Road Trip’? We’ll see about that!

holidays.title: National Solitaire Day
holidays.description: Addicted to playing solitaire? Find out more about your favorite card game!

holidays.title: National Title Track Day
holidays.description: Keep reading to find out how title tracks evolved over the years and how to celebrate.

holidays.title: National Vanilla Pudding Day
holidays.description: Dedicate May 22 to your love for vanilla puddings. Here’s all you need to know.

holidays.title: Sherlock Holmes Day
holidays.description: Did you know that 21% of the British think that Sherlock Holmes was a real person?

holidays.title: Slavery Abolition Day (Martinique)
holidays.description: Discover ways to look back and honor the fight against slavery in Martinique.

holidays.title: World Goth Day
holidays.description: World Goth Day encourages people to learn about the goth culture and let go of their prejudices.

holidays.title: World Paloma Day
holidays.description: May 22 is the perfect opportunity for you to get your hands on this delicious cocktail!

holidays.title: World Preeclampsia Day
holidays.description: Let's all do our share to raise awareness about this possibly life-threatening pregnancy condition!

holidays.title: Emma Chamberlain’s Birthday
holidays.description: Emma Chamberlain keeps proving that content creation and persistence can bring value holistically.
